name: lfmt-gemini-poc
description: Long-Form Translation Service POC - AWS serverless translation platform for 65K-400K word documents

scripts.test: cd shared-types && npm test && cd ../backend/infrastructure && npm test && cd ../../backend/functions && npm install --cache ./.npm-cache --legacy-peer-deps && npm test
scripts.setup: npm run setup:hooks && npm run install:all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:infra
scripts.test:all: npm run test:shared && npm run test:infra && npm run test:functions
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:infra && npm run build:functions
scripts.validate: npm run build:all && npm run test:all && npm run security:check
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:infra && npm run lint:functions
scripts.lint:shared: cd shared-types && npm run lint || echo 'Linting not configured for shared-types'
scripts.lint:infra: cd backend/infrastructure && npm run lint || echo 'Linting not configured for infrastructure'
scripts.lint:functions: cd backend/functions && npm run lint || echo 'Linting not configured for functions'
scripts.deploy:dev: cd backend/infrastructure && npm run build && npx cdk deploy --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: cd backend/infrastructure && npm run build && npx cdk deploy --context environment=staging
scripts.synth: cd backend/infrastructure && npm run build && npx cdk synth --context environment=dev

author: LFMT Team
